title: Scheduled Power Maintenance
bodyMarkdown:
The local utility company will be performing routine maintenance on the power lines.

**Date:** November 10, 2025
**Time:** 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM

Power may be interrupted briefly during this window. Please plan accordingly and save any work on electronic devices.

title: Water Service Interruption - Creek Rd
bodyMarkdown:
Water service will be temporarily interrupted for line repair work.

**Affected:** All cabins on Creek Road (Cabins 10-20)
**Date:** November 12, 2025
**Time:** 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM

Please fill containers with water beforehand if needed.
